dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Focuses on fasting, how hard it is for her, and the call to be holy, to become whole persons--spiritually, mentally, and physically. Lists the many speaking s tops and visits with friends and workers in a trip through the Midwest. Keyword: saints
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 541 1974-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
